name: df-lnop
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(clo, crab(s0, co(chba, cmap, chba), wral(s1, cc, wral(s2, chba, wral(s3, chba, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), co(co(cv(s1), csm, cv(s2)), cva, cv(s3))), co(co(cv(s1), csm, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), cva, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)))))))))
comment: Define the set of linear operators on Hilbert space. (See ~ df-hosum for definition of operator.) (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
